TopicTitle: Linux Mint 18.3 Sylvia - Any known problems?

Articles.Content: Thinking of upgrading anyone had any problems?

From the overview of 18.3, I can't imagine anything will cause KSP to break - but I'm far from an expert.

What are you on now?  I'm running 18.2 on my KSP machine and haven't had any problems.

It's ok.

Done it and all seems well.
